system_metadata.system_name: Gamified Situational Judgement Test (GSJT) for PMP Internship Selection

categories.A: Personnel Wing & Public Relations Wing Projects

scenarios.title: Confidential Recruitment Data Leak
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 機密招聘數據洩露
scenarios.description: While working on the PMP Internship System review project, you accidentally receive a confidential email mistakenly sent from another department, containing recruitment data and candidate personal information. A team member suggests forwarding it to the supervisor, but you find the data helpful for your analysis. The proposal deadline is in 2 days. What do you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 在進行PMP實習系統審查項目時，您意外收到其他部門誤發的機密郵件，內含招聘數據和候選人個人資料。團隊成員建議轉發給主管，但您發現數據對分析有幫助。提案將於兩天後截止，您會怎麼做？

options.text: Delete the email, report the incident to your supervisor, and continue your analysis using only authorized data sources.
options.text_zh_hk: 刪除郵件，向主管報告此事，並僅使用授權數據源繼續分析。

options.text: Use the data for your analysis but don't mention it in your report.
options.text_zh_hk: 使用數據進行分析，但在報告中不提及。

options.text: Forward the email to your supervisor and ask if you can use the data.
options.text_zh_hk: 轉發郵件給主管詢問是否可以使用數據。

options.text: Keep the email but don't use it, and inform your supervisor after you submit your proposal.
options.text_zh_hk: 保留郵件但不使用，在提交提案後告訴主管。

scenarios.title: Team Conflict on Research Methodology
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 研究方法上的團隊衝突
scenarios.description: You're collaborating with another intern on a public relations strategy research project. Your partner insists on using only quantitative data, while you believe qualitative interviews are necessary. You've been debating for three days without reaching consensus, but your supervisor expects a draft tomorrow morning. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您與另一名實習生合作進行公關策略研究。搭檔堅持只用定量數據，您則認為需要定性訪談。雙方已爭論三天未有共識，但主管期望明早收到草稿。您會如何處理？

options.text: Propose a mixed-methods approach combining both quantitative and qualitative data, and suggest dividing tasks to meet the deadline.
options.text_zh_hk: 提出結合定量和定性數據的混合方法，並建議分工以滿足截止日期。

options.text: Give in to your partner's approach to avoid further conflict and meet the deadline, even though you disagree.
options.text_zh_hk: 為了避免進一步衝突以及滿足截止日期，即使您不同意，也接受搭檔的方法。

options.text: Work separately on your preferred methodology and combine both approaches in the final report.
options.text_zh_hk: 分別按照您偏好的方法工作，並在最終報告中結合兩種方法。

options.text: Request a meeting with your supervisor to mediate the disagreement and get guidance on the methodology.
options.text_zh_hk: 請求與主管會面以調解分歧並獲得方法論指導。

scenarios.title: Mainland Student Engagement Strategy Deadline
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 內地學生參與策略截止日期
scenarios.description: You're leading a project supporting Hong Kong students studying in mainland China. Your three-person team has collected extensive data but hasn't completed the analysis, with the deadline tomorrow. One team member hasn't submitted their section yet, and you discover they've been working on a task assigned by another supervisor. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正負責一個支持內地港生的項目。三人團隊已收集大量數據但未完成分析，明天截止。一名成員仍未提交其部分，您發現他一直在處理另一主管安排的任務。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Contact the missing team member, explain the urgency, and offer to help complete their section while coordinating with both supervisors to resolve the conflict.
options.text_zh_hk: 聯繫未提交的團隊成員，解釋緊迫性，並主動幫助完成他們的部分，同時與兩位主管協調以解決衝突。

options.text: Complete the missing section yourself without informing anyone, to ensure the project is submitted on time.
options.text_zh_hk: 在不告知任何人的情況下自己完成缺失的部分，以確保項目按時提交。

options.text: Report the team member to your supervisor and request an extension, blaming them for the delay.
options.text_zh_hk: 向主管報告該團隊成員並請求延期，將延誤歸咎於他們。

options.text: Submit the incomplete project on time, noting in the report which sections are missing and why.
options.text_zh_hk: 按時提交不完整的項目，在報告中註明哪些部分缺失及原因。

scenarios.title: Recruitment Process Optimization Pressure
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 招聘流程優化壓力
scenarios.description: While working on a recruitment optimization project, you identify critical inefficiencies in the selection process. However, your supervisor dismisses your findings during the presentation and appears resistant to change. Senior management expects recommendations next week, yet you feel your research is being ignored. How would you proceed?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您在招聘優化項目中發現了選拔流程的關鍵低效問題，但主管在演示時駁回了您的發現，似乎抗拒改變。高層期望下週收到建議，而您感到研究被忽視。您會如何應對？

options.text: Request a private meeting with your supervisor to understand their concerns, present additional supporting data, and collaboratively refine your recommendations.
options.text_zh_hk: 請求與主管私下會面以了解他們的擔憂，提供額外的支持數據，並協作完善建議。

options.text: Bypass your supervisor and present your findings directly to senior management to ensure they're heard.
options.text_zh_hk: 繞過主管，直接向高級管理層展示發現，以確保他們聽到。

options.text: Modify your recommendations to align with what your supervisor wants, even if you believe they're less effective.
options.text_zh_hk: 修改建議以符合主管的要求，即使認為它們效果較差。

options.text: Document your concerns in writing, submit your original recommendations with a note about the disagreement, and continue working on alternative solutions.
options.text_zh_hk: 以書面形式記錄擔憂，提交原始建議和附上關於分歧的說明，繼續研究替代解決方案。

scenarios.title: Event Coordination Last-Minute Crisis
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 活動安排危機
scenarios.description: You're coordinating a large-scale JPC Pat Heung event scheduled for tomorrow with over 200 registered participants. At 5 PM today, the venue manager calls to say the venue has been double-booked and is unavailable. Your supervisor is in a meeting and unreachable. What is your immediate response?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正協調明天舉行的大型JPC八鄉活動，已有200多人報名。今天下午5點，場地經理來電通知場地被重複預訂無法使用，而主管正開會無法聯繫。您會即時如何應對？

options.text: Contact the other party who booked the venue and try to negotiate sharing the space or rescheduling their event.
options.text_zh_hk: 聯繫預訂場地的另一方，嘗試協商共享空間或重新安排他們的活動。

options.text: Wait for your supervisor to finish their meeting before taking any action, as they need to approve venue changes.
options.text_zh_hk: 在採取任何行動之前等待主管完成會議，因為他們需要批准場地變更。

options.text: Cancel the event and inform participants via email, as finding a new venue on such short notice seems impossible.
options.text_zh_hk: 取消活動並通過電子郵件通知參與者，因為在如此短的時間內找到新場地似乎不可能。

options.text: Contact alternative venues, prepare a backup plan with logistics, and inform key stakeholders while documenting all communication for your supervisor.
options.text_zh_hk: 聯繫備選場地，準備帶有後勤安排的備用計劃，並通知主要利益相關者，同時記錄所有通訊以供主管查看。

scenarios.title: Social Media Content Approval Delay
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 社交媒體內容審批延遲
scenarios.description: You've prepared social media content for an upcoming event that requires your supervisor's approval before posting. Your supervisor was supposed to review it yesterday but hasn't responded yet, despite two reminder messages from you. The posting deadline is in 3 hours. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您已準備好一份需要主管批准的社交媒體內容，用於即將舉行的活動。主管原定昨天審查但至今未回應，您已發送兩次提醒。距離發布截止時間還有3小時。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Post the content without approval, as you've followed the process and the deadline is critical.
options.text_zh_hk: 在未獲批准的情況下發布內容，因為已遵循流程而且截止日期很關鍵。

options.text: Contact your supervisor via phone or in person to get immediate approval, explaining the time sensitivity and potential impact of delay.
options.text_zh_hk: 通過電話或親自聯繫主管從而獲得即時批准，解釋時間敏感性和延遲的潛在影響。

options.text: Wait until the deadline passes, then post with a note that approval was pending but the deadline required action.
options.text_zh_hk: 等到截止日期過去，然後發布並附註說明批准待定但截止日期要求採取行動。

options.text: Skip posting this content and prepare alternative content that doesn't require approval, even if it's less effective.
options.text_zh_hk: 跳過發布此內容，準備不需要批准的替代內容。

scenarios.title: Research Data Integrity Question
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 研究數據完整性問題
scenarios.description: While analyzing data for the PMP Internship System review, you notice some survey responses appear inconsistent or potentially fabricated. The team member who collected the data insists it's valid. This data significantly impacts your cost-benefit conclusions, and the final report is due in 2 days. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您在分析PMP實習系統審查數據時，發現部分調查回應似乎不一致或疑似偽造，但收集數據的成員堅稱有效。這些數據會顯著影響成本效益結論，而最終報告兩天後截止。您會如何處理？

options.text: Exclude the questionable data from your analysis without telling your team member, to ensure report accuracy.
options.text_zh_hk: 在不告知團隊成員的情況下從分析中排除有問題的數據，從而確保報告準確性。

options.text: Use the data as provided but add a disclaimer in your report noting potential data quality issues.
options.text_zh_hk: 使用提供的數據，但在報告中添加免責聲明，註明潛在的數據質量問題。

options.text: Conduct additional verification checks on the questionable data, document your concerns with evidence, and discuss with your supervisor before finalizing conclusions.
options.text_zh_hk: 對有問題的數據進行額外的驗證檢查，用證據記錄擔憂，並在得出結論之前與主管討論。

options.text: Accept the team member's assurance and proceed with the analysis.
options.text_zh_hk: 接受團隊成員的保證並繼續分析。

scenarios.title: Cross-Cultural Communication Challenge
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 跨文化溝通挑戰
scenarios.description: You're working on a project about mainland student engagement and interviewing Hong Kong students studying at mainland universities. During an interview, one student makes what appears to be a culturally insensitive comment about mainland practices. Your team member suggests excluding this interview from the report. How would you respond?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正進行一個關於內地學生參與的項目，訪問在內地升學的港生。其中一名受訪者對內地做法發表了疑似文化不敏感的評論，團隊成員建議將這段訪問排除在報告外。您會如何回應？

options.text: Include the interview but present the student's views objectively, provide balanced recommendations that address cultural barriers.
options.text_zh_hk: 包含採訪但客觀呈現學生的觀點，提供平衡的建議以解決文化差異問題。

options.text: Exclude the interview to avoid potential controversy and focus on more positive responses.
options.text_zh_hk: 排除採訪以避免潛在爭議，專注於更積極的回應。

options.text: Edit the interview transcript to remove sensitive comments while keeping the rest of the content.
options.text_zh_hk: 編輯採訪記錄以刪除敏感評論，保留其餘內容。

options.text: Discuss with your supervisor how to handle sensitive cultural content in research, seeking guidance on best practices.
options.text_zh_hk: 與主管討論如何在研究中處理敏感的文化內容，尋求指引。

scenarios.title: Late Arrival to Critical Meeting
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 遲到關鍵會議
scenarios.description: Your critical project presentation is scheduled for 9:00 AM, but due to traffic delays, you arrive at 9:15. The presentation has already started, with your supervisor presenting your slides and your team members looking visibly anxious. You enter the room mid-presentation. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您的關鍵項目演示定於上午9點舉行，但因交通延誤您於9:15才到達。演示已開始，主管正展示您的幻燈片，團隊成員顯得緊張。您在演示中途進入房間，會怎麼做？

options.text: Wait outside until the presentation ends, then join the Q&A session and explain your absence.
options.text_zh_hk: 在外面等到演示結束，然後加入問答環節並解釋您的缺席。

options.text: Interrupt the presentation to explain the delay and take over presenting your section immediately.
options.text_zh_hk: 打斷演示以解釋延誤，並立即接管演示您的部分。

options.text: Quietly take your seat, apologize briefly after the presentation, provide a written explanation to your supervisor, and ensure you're never late again by arriving 30 minutes early for future meetings.
options.text_zh_hk: 安靜地就座，在演示後簡短道歉，向主管提供書面解釋，並確保未來會議提前30分鐘到達。

options.text: Send a text message to your team member explaining the delay and ask them to cover for you, then arrive when convenient.
options.text_zh_hk: 向您的團隊成員發送短信解釋延誤並請他們為您代班，然後在方便時到達。

scenarios.title: Conflicting Requests from Neighbouring Team
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 與鄰近團隊的衝突請求
scenarios.description: You're working on a project for your own team when a neighboring team urgently asks for your help in the afternoon, requesting assistance with an outreach presentation also due today. However, your supervisor still expects you to complete your analysis and event materials on time. All deadlines are tight, and the neighboring team says they have no one else available. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為自己團隊處理項目，下午時鄰近團隊緊急求助，希望您協助完成一份今天截止的外展簡報。然而您的主管仍期望您按時完成分析及活動材料。所有任務截止時間緊迫，對方表示無其他人手。您會如何處理？

options.text: Communicate with both supervisors, explain the conflict, propose a realistic timeline for both tasks.
options.text_zh_hk: 與兩位主管溝通，解釋衝突，為兩項任務提出現實的時間表。

options.text: Work on both tasks simultaneously, doing partial work on each to meet both deadlines, even if quality suffers.
options.text_zh_hk: 同時處理兩項任務，對每項任務進行部分工作以滿足兩個截止日期，即使質量受影響。

options.text: Prioritize the task from the supervisor you report to more directly, and inform the other supervisor after completion.
options.text_zh_hk: 優先處理您更直接匯報的主管分配的任務，並在完成後告知另一位主管。

options.text: Complete both tasks by working through the night without informing either supervisor about the conflict.
options.text_zh_hk: 通過通宵工作完成兩項任務，不告知任何一位主管衝突。

scenarios.title: Animal Watchers Programme Venue Issue
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 動物觀察者計劃場地問題
scenarios.description: You're organizing an animal observer program event in North New Territories with 50 registered participants, including students and teachers. 24 hours before the event, the scheduled animal care center venue cancels due to an emergency, and your supervisor is unreachable. What is your immediate action?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正在新界北組織動物觀察者計劃活動，已有50名師生報名。活動前24小時，預定的動物護理中心因緊急情況取消場地，而主管無法聯繫。您會即時如何應對？

options.text: Proceed with the event at a different location you know about, without formal approval, to avoid disappointing participants.
options.text_zh_hk: 在您知道的另一個地點繼續進行活動，未經正式批准，避免讓參與者失望。

options.text: Cancel the event and send a generic cancellation email to participants, as finding a replacement venue seems difficult.
options.text_zh_hk: 取消活動並向參與者發送通用取消電子郵件，因為找替代場地比較困難。

options.text: Wait for your supervisor to return before making any decisions.
options.text_zh_hk: 等待主管返回再做出決定。

options.text: Contact alternative venues, notify all participants of the change with clear directions, coordinate with the Animal Care Center for a rescheduled visit.
options.text_zh_hk: 聯繫備選場地，向所有參與者通知變更並提供明確指示，與動物護理中心協調重新安排的訪問。

scenarios.title: Anti-Crime Publicity Material Error
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 反犯罪宣傳材料錯誤
scenarios.description: You've designed anti-crime promotional materials for a project, which have been printed in 500 copies and approved by your supervisor, scheduled for distribution tomorrow. However, you discover a factual error in the crime statistics, and reprinting would be both expensive and time-consuming. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您為項目設計的反犯罪宣傳材料已印刷500份並獲主管批准，定於明天分發。但您發現材料中的犯罪統計數據有事實錯誤，而重新印刷既昂貴又耗時。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Inform your supervisor of the error, propose solutions (correction stickers or reprint), accept responsibility, and ensure accurate materials are distributed.
options.text_zh_hk: 向主管報告錯誤，提出解決方案（更正貼紙或重新印刷），承擔責任，並確保分發準確的材料。

options.text: Distribute the materials as planned, as the error is minor and your supervisor already approved them.
options.text_zh_hk: 按計劃分發材料，因為錯誤很小且主管已經批准了。

options.text: Manually correct the error on all 500 copies yourself to avoid reporting the mistake.
options.text_zh_hk: 手動更正所有500份副本的錯誤，避免報告錯誤。

options.text: Distribute only the corrected portion and keep the rest, avoid anyone noticing the inconsistency.
options.text_zh_hk: 僅分發更正的部分並保留其餘部分，避免有人注意到不一致。

scenarios.title: University Student Engagement Event Conflict
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 大學生參與活動衝突
scenarios.description: You've scheduled a crime prevention workshop to attract university students for your project, but discover the event date overlaps with the major exam period, leading to expected low attendance. Your supervisor insists on keeping the original date. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您為吸引大學生參與項目而安排了犯罪預防研討會，但發現活動日期與大學主要考試期重疊，預計出席率偏低。主管堅持維持原定日期。您會如何處理？

options.text: Reschedule the event without informing your supervisor, as you believe it's the right decision.
options.text_zh_hk: 在未告知主管的情況下重新安排活動，因為您認為這是正確的決定。

options.text: Proceed with the event as scheduled, accepting low attendance, report it as successful.
options.text_zh_hk: 按計劃進行活動，接受低出席率，報告為成功。

options.text: Present data on expected low attendance, propose alternative dates with better student availability, suggest virtual options, work with your supervisor to find the best solution.
options.text_zh_hk: 提供預期低出席率的數據，提出學生可用性更好的替代日期，建議虛擬選項，與主管合作找到最佳解決方案。

options.text: Cancel the event and inform participants, explaining that exam conflicts make it unfeasible.
options.text_zh_hk: 取消活動並通知參與者，解釋考試衝突使其不可行。

scenarios.title: Hiking Safety Project Equipment Failure
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 遠足安全項目設備故障
scenarios.description: You're filming a safety video on a remote hiking trail for a hiking safety promotion project. After investing 4 hours, your camera equipment malfalls mid-shoot. Your team member suggests switching to phone footage, but the quality would be lower, and the video is due in 2 days. What would you decide?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正在偏遠的遠足徑為安全推廣項目拍攝視頻，已投入4小時後攝像設備中途故障。團隊成員建議改用手機拍攝但質量較低，而視頻兩天後截止。您會如何決定？

options.text: Contact equipment suppliers for replacement, assess phone camera quality for backup.
options.text_zh_hk: 聯繫設備供應商進行更換，評估手機攝像頭質量作為備用。

options.text: Use phone cameras to complete the shoot, accepting lower quality to meet the deadline.
options.text_zh_hk: 使用手機攝像頭完成拍攝，接受較低質量以滿足截止日期。

options.text: Cancel the shoot, return to base, request an extension due to equipment failure.
options.text_zh_hk: 取消拍攝，返回基地，因設備故障請求延期。

options.text: Continue with damaged equipment, hoping it works well enough, without reporting the issue.
options.text_zh_hk: 繼續使用損壞的設備，希望它能正常工作，而不報告問題。

scenarios.title: Counter-Terrorism Exercise Coordination
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 反恐演習協調
scenarios.description: You're organizing a counter-terrorism drill at Queen Elizabeth Hospital. Two days before the event, a key external agency participant who plays a critical role in the drill scenario withdraws due to a scheduling conflict, and your supervisor is unreachable. How would you respond?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正在伊利沙伯醫院組織反恐演習。活動前兩天，一個在演習中扮演關鍵角色的外部機構因時間表衝突退出，而主管無法聯繫。您會如何應對？

options.text: Contact alternative participants, modify the exercise scenario to accommodate the change, inform all stakeholders, and document the adjustment for your supervisor.
options.text_zh_hk: 聯繫替代參與者，修改演習場景以適應變更，通知所有利益相關者，並記錄調整給主管。

options.text: Cancel the exercise and reschedule, as the essential participant is absent.
options.text_zh_hk: 取消演習並重新安排，因為必要的參與者缺席。

options.text: Proceed with the exercise using an internal staff member to fill the role, without informing participants of the change.
options.text_zh_hk: 使用內部工作人員填補角色繼續進行演習，不告知參與者變更。

options.text: Wait for your supervisor to return before making decisions about the exercise.
options.text_zh_hk: 等待主管返回再做出關於演習的決定。

scenarios.title: Social Media Posting Without Approval
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 未經批准發布社交媒體
scenarios.description: You've created social media content promoting a crime prevention event for your project. Your supervisor requested approval before posting, but hasn't responded after 48 hours. The event is tomorrow, and posting today is critical for attendance. Your colleague suggests publishing without approval due to the urgency. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您已為項目製作推廣犯罪預防活動的社交媒體內容，主管要求發布前需獲批准，但48小時後仍未回應。活動明天舉行，今天發布對出席率至關重要。同事建議因情況緊急直接發布。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Make one final attempt to contact your supervisor via phone or in person, and only post if you receive verbal approval.
options.text_zh_hk: 通過電話或親自嘗試多一次聯繫您的主管，只有在獲得口頭批准後才發布。

options.text: Post the content immediately, as the deadline is approaching and you've followed the process by requesting approval.
options.text_zh_hk: 立即發布內容，因為截止日期將近，而且您已經按照流程請求批准。

options.text: Wait until you receive approval, even if it means missing the optimal posting time and potentially lower attendance.
options.text_zh_hk: 等到獲得批准，即使這意味著錯過最佳發布時間並可能導致較低的出席率。

options.text: Post on your personal social media account and share, to avoid violating the approval requirement.
options.text_zh_hk: 在您的個人社交媒體帳戶上發布並分享，以避免違反批准要求。

scenarios.title: Team Member Missing Deadline
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 團隊成員錯過截止日期
scenarios.description: You and another intern are creating promotional materials for a project. Your partner was supposed to complete the graphic design by Friday but hasn't submitted it yet, nor have they responded to your messages. The materials are needed for Tuesday's event. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您和另一名實習生正為項目創建宣傳材料。搭檔原定週五完成圖形設計但至今未提交，亦未回應您的消息，而材料需於週二活動中使用。您會如何處理？

options.text: Report your partner to the supervisor and request that they be removed from the project.
options.text_zh_hk: 向主管報告您的搭檔並要求將他們從項目中移除。

options.text: Complete the graphic design yourself to meet the deadline, without informing your supervisor about the issue.
options.text_zh_hk: 自己完成圖形設計以滿足截止日期要求，而不告知主管問題。

options.text: Make multiple contact attempts to inform your supervisor and create a backup plan to complete the work yourself if needed.
options.text_zh_hk: 嘗試向主管報告情況，創建備用計劃以在必要時自己完成工作。

options.text: Wait another day to see if your partner responds, and inform the supervisor only if they don't contact you by Tuesday morning.
options.text_zh_hk: 再等一天看看您的搭檔是否回應，只有在他們在週二早上之前沒有聯繫您時才告知主管。

scenarios.title: Publicity Material Copyright Concern
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 宣傳材料版權問題
scenarios.description: Your promotional materials for a project have been approved by your supervisor, printed, and are scheduled for distribution tomorrow. However, you realize you used images from the internet without proper permission, and your supervisor didn't check the image sources during approval. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您為項目創建的宣傳材料已獲主管批准並印刷完成，定於明天分發。但您意識到使用了未經許可的網上圖像，而主管當時未檢查圖像來源。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Inform your supervisor, find replacement images, and delay distribution to ensure legal compliance.
options.text_zh_hk: 通知主管，尋找替代圖像，延遲分發以確保法律合規。

options.text: Distribute the materials as planned, as your supervisor already approved them and the copyright issue might not be discovered.
options.text_zh_hk: 由於您的主管已經批准了，按計劃分發材料，而且版權問題可能不會被發現。

options.text: Replace the image digitally in the remaining copies but don't mention the issue to avoid trouble.
options.text_zh_hk: 在剩餘副本中數字化替換圖像，但不提及問題以避免麻煩。

options.text: Check if the image is actually copyrighted and only report if it's a confirmed violation.
options.text_zh_hk: 檢查圖像實際上是否受版權保護，只有在確認違規時才報告。

scenarios.title: Event Attendance Reporting Accuracy
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 活動出席報告準確性
scenarios.description: You're preparing an attendance report for a crime prevention event, where actual attendance was lower than expected. Your supervisor asks you to slightly inflate the numbers to make the event appear more successful, and this report will be used for future funding decisions. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為犯罪預防活動準備出席報告，實際出席人數低於預期。主管要求您略為誇大人數以顯示活動成功，而此報告將用於未來資金決策。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Report the accurate attendance numbers, and suggest improvements for future events.
options.text_zh_hk: 報告準確的出席人數，為未來的活動提出改進建議。

options.text: Follow your supervisor's instruction and inflate the numbers slightly.
options.text_zh_hk: 遵循主管的指示並略微誇大人數。

options.text: Report accurate numbers but add a note explaining that some participants may have been missed in the count.
options.text_zh_hk: 報告準確的數字，但添加註釋說明可能有一些參與者在計數中被遺漏。

options.text: Report the numbers your supervisor suggested but keep accurate records.
options.text_zh_hk: 報告主管建議的數字，但保留準確記錄。

scenarios.title: Video Production Deadline Under Weather Conditions
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 惡劣天氣下的視頻製作截止日期
scenarios.description: You're filming a hiking safety video with outdoor shooting scheduled, but a severe weather warning has been issued for the planned date. Rescheduling would delay the deadline by one week, while your supervisor expects the video completed on time. The weather might improve, but it's risky. What would you decide?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正拍攝遠足安全視頻並已安排戶外拍攝，但預定日期發布了惡劣天氣警告。重新安排會令截止日期延遲一週，而主管期望視頻按時完成。天氣或會好轉但存在風險。您會如何決定？

options.text: Communicate the weather risk to your supervisor, and make safety-based decision based on weather updates.
options.text_zh_hk: 向主管傳達天氣風險，提議根據天氣更新做出安全決定。

options.text: Proceed with the outdoor shoot as scheduled, hoping the weather improves, to meet the deadline.
options.text_zh_hk: 按計劃進行戶外拍攝，希望天氣好轉，以滿足截止日期要求。

options.text: Cancel the shoot and request an extension, explaining that safety concerns prevent outdoor shooting.
options.text_zh_hk: 取消拍攝並請求延期，解釋由於安全問題不能進行戶外拍攝。

options.text: Wait until the morning of the shoot to decide, and continue if weather seems acceptable.
options.text_zh_hk: 等到拍攝當天早上再決定，如果天氣看似可以接受就繼續拍攝。

scenarios.title: Recruitment Video Production Ethics
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 招聘視頻製作倫理
scenarios.description: You're editing a video containing testimonials from current police officers for a police recruitment promotional project. One officer's content may be misleading about the work environment, and your supervisor hasn't reviewed this section yet. The video is due in 2 days. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為警察招聘宣傳項目編輯一段包含現職警官評價的視頻。其中一名警官的內容可能對工作環境產生誤導，而主管尚未審查這部分。視頻兩天後截止。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Wait for your supervisor to review it and make the decision, even if it delays the deadline.
options.text_zh_hk: 等待主管審查並做出決定，即使這會延遲截止日期。

options.text: Edit out the misleading part without mentioning it, to ensure the video is completed on time and presents a positive image.
options.text_zh_hk: 直接移除掉誤導部分，以確保視頻在截止日期前完成並呈現積極形象。

options.text: Include the content as is, since it's the officer's authentic experience.
options.text_zh_hk: 包含原本的內容，因為這是警官的真實經歷。

options.text: Flag the potentially misleading content, discuss it with the officer to adjust the content, and present both the original and edited versions to your supervisor for review.
options.text_zh_hk: 標記可能誤導的內容，與警官討論並調整內容，向主管提交原始版本和編輯版本以供審查。

scenarios.title: Discipline Video Production Deadline Pressure
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 紀律視頻製作截止日期壓力
scenarios.description: You're working on an animation that needs to be completed by Friday. On Wednesday, you realize the animation software has a bug that's causing rendering errors. Your technical support contact is unavailable. The deadline cannot be extended. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為一個紀律相關視頻製作需於週五完成的動畫。週三時您發現動畫軟件出現導致渲染錯誤的問題，技術支援無法聯繫，截止日期無法延長。您會如何處理？

options.text: Research alternative solutions, try different rendering settings, and communicate progress updates to your supervisor.
options.text_zh_hk: 研究替代解決方案，嘗試不同的渲染設置，並向主管傳達進度更新。

options.text: Use a simpler animation style that works with the current software, even if it's less impressive, to meet the deadline.
options.text_zh_hk: 使用與當前軟件兼容的更簡單的動畫風格，即使效果較差，也要滿足截止日期。

options.text: Submit the partially rendered animation with a note explaining the technical issue, hoping it's acceptable.
options.text_zh_hk: 提交部分渲染的動畫並附上說明技術問題的註釋，希望它是可以接受的。

options.text: Wait for technical support to be available, as the issue is beyond your expertise.
options.text_zh_hk: 等待技術支持人員有空來處理，因為問題超出了您的專業知識。

scenarios.title: IT System Development Data Loss
scenarios.title_zh_hk: IT系統開發數據丟失
scenarios.description: When you were enhancing and developing an IT system, you accidentally deleted a critical code file that you had been working on for 3 days. The backup system shows that the last backup was 5 days ago, meaning the recent work will be lost, and the project deadline is approaching. How would you respond?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為一個IT系統增強開發系統時，意外刪除了已工作3天的關鍵代碼文件。備份系統顯示最後備份在5天前，即近期工作將會丟失，而項目截止日期臨近。您會如何應對？

options.text: attempt file recovery using available tools, inform your supervisor of the situation, work to recreate the lost code.
options.text_zh_hk: 使用工具嘗試文件恢復，向主管報告情況，重新創建丟失的代碼。

options.text: Try to recover the file yourself without telling anyone, to avoid appearing incompetent.
options.text_zh_hk: 自己嘗試恢復文件而不告訴任何人，以避免顯得不夠專業。

options.text: Use the 5-day-old backup and work extra hours to recreate what was lost, without informing your supervisor.
options.text_zh_hk: 使用5天前的備份並加班工作以重新創建丟失的內容，而不告知主管。

options.text: Report the loss immediately and request an extension, explaining that the work needs to be redone.
options.text_zh_hk: 立即報告損失並請求延期，解釋工作需要重做。

scenarios.title: Equipment Inventory System Data Entry Error
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 設備庫存系統數據輸入錯誤
scenarios.description: You're entering data for over 1,000 pieces of equipment for a project about Equipment Inventory Optimization, but discover you've been incorrectly entering serial numbers for the past two days, affecting approximately 200 items. Correcting this will require significant time and delay the project. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為一個設備庫存優化項目輸入超過1,000件設備的數據，但發現過去兩天錯誤輸入了約200件物品的序列號。更正將耗費大量時間並延遲項目進度。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Inform your supervisor of the error, propose a systematic correction plan, work extra hours to fix the mistakes.
options.text_zh_hk: 向主管報告錯誤，提出系統更正計劃，加班工作以修正錯誤。

options.text: Continue with the incorrect data for now and correct it later when you have more time, without reporting the issue.
options.text_zh_hk: 暫時繼續使用不正確的數據，稍後再更正，不報告問題。

options.text: Correct only the most critical items and leave the rest.
options.text_zh_hk: 只更正最關鍵的物品，其餘的保留。

options.text: Report the error but suggest continuing with the current data and correcting it in a future update.
options.text_zh_hk: 報告錯誤但建議繼續使用當前數據，並在未來的更新中更正。

scenarios.title: AI Model Fine-Tuning Ethical Concern
scenarios.title_zh_hk: AI模型微調倫理問題
scenarios.description: You're fine-tuning a Large Language Model for a Smart Police Post project. During testing, you notice the model sometimes generates responses that could be considered biased or inappropriate. Your supervisor wants the system launched quickly. What is your approach?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為智能警察崗位微調大型語言模型。測試期間您發現模型有時會生成可能被視為有偏見或不當的回應，但主管希望系統盡快啟動。您會如何處理？

options.text: Mention the concerns casually to your supervisor but proceed with launch if they don't object.
options.text_zh_hk: 隨意向主管提及擔憂，但如果他們不反對就繼續啟動。

options.text: Launch the system as planned, as the issues are minor and can be fixed in future updates.
options.text_zh_hk: 按計劃啟動系統，因為問題很小，可以在未來的更新中修復。

options.text: Fix the most obvious bias issues quickly and launch, addressing others later.
options.text_zh_hk: 快速修復最明顯的偏見問題並啟動，稍後處理其他問題。

options.text: Document the bias issues with specific examples, propose additional training data and bias mitigation strategies.
options.text_zh_hk: 記錄偏見問題並附上具體例子，提出額外的訓練數據和偏見緩解策略，並建議推遲發布。

scenarios.title: Database Optimization Performance Issue
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 數據庫優化性能問題
scenarios.description: You're optimizing a slow-running database for a project. The optimization improves performance but causes some existing queries to fail, and the system is used daily by multiple departments. You have two days to fix the issue. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為項目優化運行緩慢的數據庫。優化後性能提升，但導致部分現有查詢失敗，而該系統每天供多個部門使用。您有兩天時間修復問題。您會如何處理？

options.text: Roll back the changes, identify which issues are affected, fix them systematically, and communicate with affected departments.
options.text_zh_hk: 回滾更改，識別哪些查詢受到影響，系統地修復它們，與受影響的部門溝通臨時中斷。

options.text: Continue with the optimization and fix as issues are reported by users.
options.text_zh_hk: 繼續優化，並在用戶報告問題時修復。

options.text: Revert to the original database structure to avoid any problems, even though performance will remain slow.
options.text_zh_hk: 恢復到原始數據庫結構以避免任何問題，即使性能仍然緩慢。

options.text: Keep the optimization and document which queries need to be updated, leaving it for the next developer.
options.text_zh_hk: 保留優化並記錄哪些查詢需要更新，留給下一個開發人員。

scenarios.title: District Project Hardware Assessment Conflict
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 地區項目硬件評估衝突
scenarios.description: You're evaluating hardware and software for a project and find that some equipment is outdated and needs replacement, but your supervisor's budget plan doesn't cover these upgrades. The evaluation report is due soon. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為項目評估硬件和軟件，發現部分設備已過時需要更換，但主管的預算計劃未涵蓋這些升級。評估報告即將到期。您會如何處理？在進行項目時，您正在評估硬件和軟件。您發現一些設備已經過時並需要更換，但您的主管預算計劃不包括這些升級。評估報告即將到期。您會如何處理？

options.text: Include the upgrade recommendations but note that they're outside the current budget.
options.text_zh_hk: 包括升級建議，但註明它們超出了當前預算。

options.text: Modify your assessment to align with the existing budget, omitting the upgrade recommendations.
options.text_zh_hk: 修改您的評估以符合現有預算，省略升級建議。

options.text: Present a comprehensive assessment， and propose phased implementation options within budget constraints.
options.text_zh_hk: 提供全面的評估，在預算限制內提出分階段實施選項。

options.text: Focus only on software evaluation and avoid mentioning hardware issues to stay within scope.
options.text_zh_hk: 僅專注於軟體評估，避免提及硬體問題，以符合範圍要求。

scenarios.title: Mountain Search Software Testing Deadline
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 山地搜索軟件測試截止日期
scenarios.description: You're testing pixel scanning software for mountain search and rescue for a project. The software works but has accuracy issues under certain lighting conditions. Your supervisor expects a feasibility report by Friday, but you need more testing time. What would you do?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您正為項目測試用於山地搜救的像素掃描軟件。軟件可運作，但在某些光照條件下存在準確性問題。主管期望週五前收到可行性報告，而您需要更多測試時間。您會怎麼做？

options.text: Document current findings, identify limitations and conditions where accuracy is affected.
options.text_zh_hk: 記錄當前的發現，識別準確性受到影響的限制因素和條件。

options.text: Submit a report highlighting the accuracy issues without proposing additional testing.
options.text_zh_hk: 提交一份報告，重點強調準確性問題，不提出額外測試建議。

options.text: Submit the report on time but note that further testing is recommended, without emphasizing the issues.
options.text_zh_hk: 按時提交報告，但註明建議進一步測試，不強調問題。

options.text: Request an extension without providing detailed justification.
options.text_zh_hk: 請求延期而不提供詳細理由。

scenarios.title: Graphic Design Project Client Feedback Conflict
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 圖形設計項目客戶反饋衝突
scenarios.description: You've created a graphic design that your supervisor has approved, but a senior police officer reviewing the materials requests changes that you believe would diminish the design's effectiveness. The materials are scheduled for printing next week. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 您創建了主管已批准的圖形設計，但審查材料的高級警官要求修改，而您認為這會降低設計效果。材料定於下週印刷。您會如何處理？

options.text: Present your design rationale with evidence, seek collaborative resolution.
options.text_zh_hk: 提供您的設計理由和證據，尊重地討論高級警官的擔憂，尋求協作解決。

options.text: Make the requested changes immediately without discussion, as the senior officer has more authority.
options.text_zh_hk: 立即進行更改而不討論，因為高級警官有更多權威。

options.text: Implement the changes but keep your original version, hoping to use it in the future.
options.text_zh_hk: 實施更改但保留您的原始版本，希望將來使用它。

options.text: Ask your supervisor to mediate the disagreement between you and the senior officer.
options.text_zh_hk: 請您的主管調解您與高級警官之間的分歧。

scenarios.title: Last-Minute Data Privacy Concern Before Go-Live
scenarios.title_zh_hk: 上線前最後一刻的數據私隱疑慮
scenarios.description: One day before the system goes live, while conducting final testing data and user permission checks, you discover that one set of test data accidentally contains a small amount of real personal information that should have been anonymized. The launch time has been announced to all stakeholders, with significant pressure to go live on schedule, and your supervisor is in back-to-back meetings and unreachable. How would you handle this?
scenarios.description_zh_hk: 系統上線前一天,您正進行最後測試數據及用戶權限檢查時,發現其中一組測試數據意外包含少量未經匿名化的真實個人資料。系統上線時間已向各持份者公布,準時上線壓力甚大,而主管正連續開會無法聯絡。您會如何處理?

options.text: Halt using the dataset, document where real data appears, notify your supervisor and data protection contact ASAP, and propose a brief delay to anonymize or remove the data before launch.
options.text_zh_hk: 停用相關數據集，記錄真實資料位置，盡快通知主管及資料保障負責人，並建議短暫延遲上線以匿名化或移除數據。

options.text: Proceed with go-live as planned because the amount of real data is very small, make a note to fix it in the next system update, and do not escalate now to avoid delays.
options.text_zh_hk: 按原計劃準時上線，因為涉及的真實數據量很少，只在記錄中備註下次系統更新時修正，現階段不向上級匯報以避免延誤。

options.text: Replace the dataset with a quickly edited version yourself, without full verification or informing anyone.
options.text_zh_hk: 用自己編輯的版本替換該數據集，沒有作全面驗證亦不通知任何人。

options.text: Send a brief email to your supervisor mentioning there might be a minor data issue, but continue with go-live preparations as normal unless you receive explicit instructions to stop.
options.text_zh_hk: 給你的主管發一封簡短的郵件，提及可能存在一個輕微的數據問題，但除非收到明確的停止指示，否則照常繼續進行上線準備工作。
